B.2. Fetal assessment
B.2.1. Routine daily fetal movement (FM) counting• If routine daily FM counting is being advised• If ANC providers are advising daily FM counting in routine ANC counselling, instruct them to omit it, due to lack of evidence. • N /A • N /A
